text: my name is jaya tiwari i'm a software
development manager at aws s3
in my role as a software development
manager i hire the top talent and help
them to advance their career amazon s3
is a
unique place to work for
because we
are having trust of hundreds of millions
of customers we store trillions of
objects in aws s3
we
raise the bar on availability
reliability security and durability
so customers can upload their objects
from anywhere anytime
any amount of data and later they can
retrieve it from anywhere anytime
at amazon we earn the
customers trust and we work backward
so
we we know what customers need
and then our builders innovate and build
the products for them as you see amazon
has a leadership principal strive to be
our best employer
that is our top priority in aws s3 i
don't expect from any of the engineers
or managers or anyone to work off hours
or on the weekends we don't have a
strict return to office culture we are
having hybrid model if you want to come
to office work from office if you want
to stay home and work from there you can
you can work there in my life i have not
seen any project wherever i have worked
this much scale this much complexity
technical complexity i'm getting
challenged every day you will see all
around yourself a
